title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Piotr Foksowicz
raw_text: Skip to content Issue 86 – November 2013 Cover Art Lost in Space Piotr Foksowicz (piofoks) is a digital painter and concept artist from Poland. Piotr's work often incorporates fantasy and post-apocalyptic elements and his professional credits include many pieces for card games and book covers. ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.

Skip to content
Issue 86 – November 2013
Cover Art
Lost in Space
Piotr Foksowicz (piofoks) is a digital painter and concept artist from Poland. Piotr's work often incorporates fantasy and post-apocalyptic elements and his professional credits include many pieces for card games and book covers.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
